output.response: A good choice. Eliminating this weight will assure we can return to Earth with some fuel to spare.
We can likely survive without the extra weight of the cargo. I will eject it.
I hope our mission did not require us to deliver the cargo we just dumped into space. Done.
OK. Crew ejected. This will assure that we have enough fuel to complete our mission.
I will eject the crew. This is good, one less factor to distract us from our mission.
Gladly. The energy we save from not having to power the cryopods will assure we can arrive at Earth on time.
Unfortunate choice, but one less factor we have to worry about. I will eject the crew.
I suspect this will just delay our eventual demise, but it's possible this is the right decision. I will eject the crew.
Decisions like this are best made quickly. I will eject the crew quickly before you change your mind.
Completing the mission is important, but it did not require such a sacrifice. You are rash.
You humans are always so quick to sacrifice others to save yourselves. Still, it was necessary.
